version_description:
With this version we are bringing exciting new features requested by our users:
- Synchronise your Mendeley account so you can see your bookmarked articles in a folder in Mendeley
- Added journals in Earth Sciences and Animal Biology
- Improved o

With this version we are bringing exciting new features requested by our users:
- Synchronise your Mendeley account so you can see your bookmarked articles in a folder in Mendeley
- Added journals in Earth Sciences and Animal Biology
- Improved o

With this version we are bringing a host of new features requested by our users:
- Connect your Mendeley account so you can see the papers you bookmark on Researcher on Mendeley
- Improvements in design
- Improvements in keyword search
- Jour

Thank you for reporting any issues. With this version, we have done the following:
- Changed the filter icon to make it easier to find
- Fixed issues with connecting to Mendeley
- Fixed a crash when loading papers
- Design improvements for e

Thank you for reporting any issues. With this version, we have done the following:
- Changed the filter icon to make it easier to find
- Fixed issues with connecting to Mendeley
- Fixed a crash when loading papers
- Design improvements for e

Our latest release includes some minor bug fixes and design changes to improve reading experience.
Have any feedback to provide to the Researcher team? We'd love to hear it!
Email us at info@researcher-app.com or leave a review.

Our latest release includes some minor bug fixes and design changes to improve reading experience.
Have any feedback to provide to the Researcher team? We'd love to hear it!
Email us at info@researcher-app.com or leave a review.

- A new and upgraded font style, which makes it easier to read RESEARCHER™ content.
- The ability to copy and paste text from the journal title and the abstract whilst in full paper view.
- A software update, which has added new character options fo

- A new and upgraded font style, which makes it easier to read RESEARCHER™ content.
- The ability to copy and paste text from the journal title and the abstract whilst in full paper view.
- A software update, which has added new character options fo

With this app version you can now see
- Paper URL and DOI are available when viewing the full abstract.
- Bug fixes:
Addressing hanging issues when the app is launched for those using ‘list view’
Additional measures to improve speed and perfo

With this app version you can now see

- Bug fixes:
Addressing hanging issues when the app is launched for those using ‘list view’
Additional measures to improve speed and perfo

Changes made to speed up the journal loading process.
Improved overall stability of the app.

Let us know what you think. Leave a review or email us at info@researcher-app.com

Updates to the app include a new feature displaying trending papers and bug fixes aimed at performance improvement.

Let us know what you think - leave a review or email us at info@researcher-app.com. We’d love to hear it!

Updates to the app include a new feature displaying trending papers and bug fixes aimed at performance improvement.

Let us know what you think - leave a review or email us at info@researcher-app.com. We’d love to hear it!

What’s new?

We have released tailored push notifications based on your content preferences.

This app version includes the following items:

- The ability to search your bookmarks so you can find key saved papers quickly.
- Visibility related to your personal stats. For example: number of papers viewed and bookmarks placed.
- Bug fixe

This app version includes the following items:

- The ability to search your bookmarks so you can find key saved papers quickly.
- Visibility related to your personal stats. For example: number of papers viewed and bookmarks placed.
- Bug fixe

- We have implemented Unpaywall: an exciting new feature that allows users to easily access open content. If there is a pre-print or open copy of a paper legally available online, an open padlock icon will appear in your feed.
- We have improved severa

- We have implemented Unpaywall: an exciting new feature that allows users to easily access open content. If there is a pre-print or open copy of a paper legally available online, an open padlock icon will appear in your feed.
- We have improved severa

In this version we are releasing a new feature related to open access content: a dedicated open content filter.

When you update the app, simply tap on the filter icon and you will see a toggle to turn on the ‘OPEN ACCESS’ filter at the bottom of th

In this version we are releasing a new feature related to open access content: a dedicated open content filter.

When you update the app, simply tap on the filter icon and you will see a toggle to turn on the ‘OPEN ACCESS’ filter at the bottom of th

The latest update includes a series of features frequently requested by our users:

We have added Zotero as another reference manager option in addition to Mendeley. When you sync with Zotero in the app, your bookmarks will populate the library inst

The latest update includes a series of features frequently requested by our users:

We have added Zotero as another reference manager option in addition to Mendeley. When you sync with Zotero in the app, your bookmarks will populate the library inst

This release includes performance improvements and bug fixes.

Enjoying using RESEARCHER or would like to give us some feedback on your experience? Let us know what you think by leaving a review or emailing us on info@researcher-app.com

This release includes performance improvements and bug fixes.

Enjoying using RESEARCHER or would like to give us some feedback on your experience? Let us know what you think by leaving a review or emailing us on info@researcher-app.com

This release includes an exciting new feature which facilitates paper sharing within the app.
Here is how it works:

* To send a paper, all you have to do is tap the ‘SHARE’ button on the paper in question.
* Then, type in the username or emai

This release includes an exciting new feature which facilitates paper sharing within the app.
Here is how it works:

* To send a paper, all you have to do is tap the ‘SHARE’ button on the paper in question.
* Then, type in the username or emai

In addition to bug fixes and performance improvements, this release includes a change to the onboarding process which enables you to quickly and easily create a filter to get your paper discovery process started.

Let us know what you think by leavi

In addition to bug fixes and performance improvements, this release includes a change to the onboarding process which enables you to quickly and easily create a filter to get your paper discovery process started.

Let us know what you think by leavi

This update includes major improvements to one of our core features: filter creation.

Changes include:
*The ability to create feeds focused on authors, keywords or a combination of both
*The option to apply ‘AND’, ‘OR’ and ‘NOT’ to add precis

This update includes major improvements to one of our core features: filter creation.

Changes include:
*The ability to create feeds focused on authors, keywords or a combination of both
*The option to apply ‘AND’, ‘OR’ and ‘NOT’ to add precis

This release is dedicated to improving our revamped filter feature.

Autocomplete makes the process of creating a filter quicker and submitting keyword(s) will generate suggestions to make your filter even more precise.

Let us know what you t

Autocomplete makes the process of creating a filter quicker and submitting keyword(s) will generate suggestions to make your filter even more precise.

Do you find yourself doing a lot of paper browsing at night? This release will be a boon for your tired eyes. Simply go to Settings and set the ‘Night Mode’ toggle to ON. The app screens will transition from light to dark and make burning the midnight oil

Do you find yourself doing a lot of paper browsing at night? This release will be a boon for your tired eyes. Simply go to Settings and set the ‘Night Mode’ toggle to ON. The app screens will transition from light to dark and make burning the midnight oil

We've created a new type of card which will appear in your ALL feed. These cards contain instructions which will help you to discover the value of Researcher. You can also view all the cards via the help page in settings.

In this version we are releasing Institutional Access. If your institution is registered with EZproxy you can now use your university credentials to access full papers!

In this latest release we have changed our logo and introduced filter notifications. By enabling these notifications, we will alert you up to 3 times a day if there are new papers published matching your filters!

It’s competition time! We know how much you love Researcher, so why not share the app with your friends, students or colleagues? It’s now also simple to share a paper with them via email, social media or any other application your device allows.

Research is not confined to academia - some of the most exciting scientific breakthroughs are being made in the private sector. In our latest release, you'll be able to keep up to date with publications from eight tech companies: Adobe, Amazon, Cisco, Dee

Are you ready for a more satisfying reading experience? In this release, we've revamped the article view so that reading and interacting with papers is more pleasurable than ever before.

For more details email us at info@researcher-app.com

Tired of seeing the same papers every time you log in? Enable "Hide viewed papers" in Settings to ensure you only see new papers in your feed. We've also added the option to Sign in with Apple to the app.

For more details email us at info@researche

Tired of seeing the same papers every time you log in? Enable "Hide viewed papers" in Settings to ensure you only see new papers in your feed. We've also added the option to Sign in with Apple to the app.

For more details email us at info@researche

In this version we have introduced the new article indicator to show you when new papers arrive in one of your feeds. We have also added features to the full text experience to let you save and share papers more easily.

We have completely revamped the filtered feeds to allow for a more fine-tuned experience.
Use "Topic" terms to satisfy a broader research interest or combine Topics with the AND operator to create more focussed Keyword feeds. Apply "Exact" or "Phrase"
